DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study establish efficient economic treatment scheme evaluation safety efficacy subcutaneous injection low-dose rhGM-CSF , similar injection whole lung lavage , patient PAP .
DOC.brief_title: Study Subcutaneous Injection Low-dose rhGM-CSF +/- WLL PAP .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study establish efficient economic treatment scheme evaluation safety efficacy subcutaneous injection low-dose rhGM-CSF , similar injection whole lung lavage , patient PAP . During observation , study visit occur end month . During 1-year follow-up period last 6 month treatment , participant require check various efficacy indicator .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed PAP patient Aged 1780 Signed inform consent Secondary PAP Received whole lung lavage therapy within 4 week enrollment Received previous GMCSF therapy within 6 month enrollment WBC≥12,000/ul fever≥38℃ Severe edema , severe liver , kidney , lung cardiovascular disease . Pregnant，planning get pregnant nursing Inability express subjective discomfort Serious drug allergy history , E.coli preparation rhGMCSF serious allergy history
